00063 void IPAddress::compute()
00064 { 
00065    freemem();
00066      
00067    struct addrinfo hints;
00068    memset(&hints, 0, sizeof(hints));
00069 
00070    hints.ai_family = AF_INET;
00071    hints.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00072 
00073    int err = 0;
00074    SysErrIf( (err=getaddrinfo( hostname_.c_str(), port_.c_str(), 
00075                                &hints, &pAI_ )) != 0 )
00076            .info("%s? %d:%s\n",hostname_.c_str(),err,gai_strerror(err));
00077 }
